meanings.definition: A person who stays at a resort for vacation.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, many resorters enjoy relaxing by the pool.
meanings.sent2: The resorters checked in at the front desk before heading to their rooms.
meanings.sent3: The resorters joked about having to go back to reality after their vacation.
meanings.sent4: The resorters were like bees buzzing around the resort, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent5: The resorters' laughter filled the air as they shared stories of their day.

meanings.definition: A group of people who frequent resorts.
meanings.sent1: The resorters gathered for their annual trip to the beach resort.
meanings.sent2: The resorters often book their vacations together to enjoy each other's company.
meanings.sent3: The resorters teased each other about who would win the sandcastle building contest.
meanings.sent4: The resorters were a flock of birds migrating to their favorite resort for the season.
meanings.sent5: The resorters' excitement was contagious as they planned their next getaway.

meanings.sent1: The resorters' company announced the opening of a new luxury resort in the Caribbean.
meanings.sent2: The resorters' company prided itself on providing top-notch service at all their resorts.
meanings.sent3: The resorters' company CEO dressed up as a resort mascot for the annual employee party.
meanings.sent4: The resorters' company was a well-oiled machine, managing multiple resorts with ease.
meanings.sent5: The resorters' company's success soared as more and more people chose their resorts for vacations.
